name: Clowned
description:
welcome to the circus.



Clowned is a short comedic platformer where faith is against you and will loop you when you reach the end of a level and possibly add more difficulty. Play as a clown and reach your show on time to entertain your audience.
Note:Ground Pound on the boosters to get boosted. There is a bug where if you ground pound before getting on the booster then you'll still get boosted. lets call it a "feature" ;)


Created by:
Loxmer Larson
Music composed by:
Hasan Ceylan
